response.original_title: 50 Cutest Child Stars All Grown Up
response.overview: Profiling young stars of movies and television. Also: interviews with the stars, some of whom are now adults and seen with their own children, and a Top 50 list of kid celebrities. Hosts: Keshia Knight Pulliam and Candace Cameron Bure.
response.tagline: Profiling young stars of movies and television. Also: interviews with the stars, some of whom are now adults and seen with their own children, and a Top 50 list of kid celebrities.
response.title: 50 Cutest Child Stars All Grown Up
